text:
Potato | Bristol, UK | ONSITE | Programme Lead

Potato are a lead partner on a large scale, multi-year digital project to create a state of the art, immersive experience based around an iconic and globally recognised entertainment brand. We're hire a Programme Lead to take overall responsibility for the programme delivery

https://p.ota.to/jobs/programme-lead-bristol/

Other roles include Senior Django Developer in Bristol, London and San Francisco - and a variety of UX, Scrum Master Designer positions in SF.

https://p.ota.to/jobs/
